pages.text: $(l)Dedicated To My Friends$()$(2br)This modpack wouldn't exist without my friends, who have always supported me and pushed me to do the things I love most. Making this a fun experience for us to play together was the aim, and it's turned out better than I could have ever imagined. They're the most amazing people in my life, and I will love and cherish them every day $(#ff0099)â™¥$()$(2br)                    $(thing)- Quasar$()
